snippet: The All-Star Game at CitiField on Tuesday will follow several days of related attractions, like the Futures Game and a New York Philharmonic-Mariah Carey concert in Central Park.
abstract: Events surrounding MLB's All-Star Game at CitiField include fanfest, home run derby, parade and philharmonic concert.
lead_paragraph: The All-Star Game at CitiField on Tuesday will follow several days of related attractions, like the Futures Game and a New York Philharmonic-Mariah Carey concert in Central Park.

headline.main: All-Star Events Include FanFest, Home Run Derby and Parade
headline.print_headline: All-Star Events Include FanFest, Home Run Derby and Parade
